select tm_channel.channel_id, tm_channel.channel_show_name, tm_channel.channel_show_url from dr_bi.v_dim_channel tm_channel left join dr_bi.dm_cust_channel_analyse tm_cus on tm_cus.channel_id = tm_channel.channel_id where tm_cus.calendar_id = (select max(calendar_id) from dr_bi.dm_cust_channel_analyse)
order by tm_cus.cust_register_num desc, tm_channel.channel_id desc

select calendar_id field, date_format(calendar_id,'%m月%d日') title from dr_bi.dm_cust_channel_analyse where calendar_id>=20150830 group by calendar_id, date_format(calendar_id,'%m月%d日') order by calendar_id desc

select tm_channel.channel_id, tm_channel.channel_show_name, tm_channel.channel_show_url, tm_cus.calendar_id, coalesce(tm_cus.cust_register_num,0) cust_register_num, coalesce(tm_cus.cust_register_num_total,0) cust_register_num_total from dr_bi.v_dim_channel tm_channel left join dr_bi.dm_cust_channel_analyse tm_cus on tm_cus.channel_id = tm_channel.channel_id where tm_channel.channel_id = #{channel_id}# and tm_cus.calendar_id >= '20150830' group by tm_channel.channel_id, tm_channel.channel_show_name, tm_channel.channel_show_url, tm_cus.calendar_id order by tm_cus.cust_register_num_total desc, tm_cus.calendar_id desc
select org_name channel_type from dr_bi.b_dim_channel where org_name is not null group by org_name
